attributes.comment:
I want to express my concern over the propsed USCIS fee increases. As an in
process adoptive parent, we have already paid once for our I-600A and will need to
pay again in eighteen months due to the long wait to adopt from China. We will
already be spending upwards of $15,000 on fees relating to our country and our
agency on the US side. That is not including any fees from China. It is already
extremely expensive to adopt a needy child. We will already be paying the
expensive USCIS fees twice for our adoption. Any increases to the current fees
will make it even more unaffordable to adopt a child. Please do not increase the
current fees.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kristen L. Woodard
